body.name: PRETTYCARE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 28Kpa Stick Vacuum with Powerful Brushless Motor, LED Touch Display, 45 Mins Long Runtime, Lightweight Vacuum Cleaner for Hard Floor Carpet Pet Hair, P2
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 8 mins
features: 【28Kpa Super Powerful Brushless Motor】: PRETTYCARE cordless vacuum cleaner generates high-speed airflow with an upgraded powerful brushless motor and provides up to 28,000 Pa suction in maximum mode, which is very energy-saving and efficient, generates less heat and makes less noise , providing a quiet and pleasant experience. The wireless vacuum cleaner is suitable for all floors and easy to instantly picks up coffee beans, crumbs, pet hair, fine dust, and more.

【45 Mins Super Long Runtime & Removable Battery】: The stick vacuum cleaner can clean up to 2,000 square feet of house at one time; one full charge is enough to clean your interior, furniture and awkward corners; Two charging mode, the charging cable is directly inserted into the vacuum cleaner cordless or the battery is charged separately.

【LED Display & Touch Screen】: The rechargeable vacuum cleaner cordless is equipped with an LED display at a glance, which helps you know the current performance of the battery vacuum cleaner at a glance. The large touch screen LED control panel allows you to easily adjust the vacuum power, which is more convenient and worry-free than traditional button operation. The control panel displays battery level, suction performance, brush clogged alarm and suction clogged alarm.

【Lightweight & Versatility】: The main body of the vacuum cleaner only weighs 3.55 pounds, even if you lift it up for a long time to clean, you will not feel tired, suitable for all ages. Designed with an ergonomic handle to keep your wrists stress-free. Convert your stick vacuum cleaner cordless into a handheld, allowing you to easily clean crevices, ledges, blinds, and behind furniture for a single, pet hair vacuum cleaner that cleans your entire home.

【5-Stage Filtration & Easy to Clean Filter】: This cordless vacuum cleaner adopts new cyclone technology and high-density mesh structure, 5-stage filtration effectively separates dirt. The hardwood floor vacuum cleaner helps clean up to 99.99% of tiny dust particles as small as 0.1 microns. Also, to maintain the suction power of the cordless stick vacuum cleaner, it is recommended to clean and replace the filter regularly, the filter is very easy to remove for cleaning.
body.description: Cordless stick vacuum cleaners for home use are versatile appliances designed to simplify and enhance the cleaning experience. Their primary functions include powerful suction to effectively remove dirt, dust, and debris from various surfaces, such as carpets, hardwood floors, and tile. These devices often feature multi-stage filtration systems to trap allergens and fine particles, improving indoor air quality. Additionally, cordless stick vacuums are known for their portability, allowing users to effortlessly clean stairs, corners, and under furniture. Rechargeable batteries provide cord-free convenience, while attachments enable above-floor cleaning and pet hair removal. Compact storage and user-friendly controls make them an indispensable tool for maintaining a tidy and healthy home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but not for the Orginal listing price.
reviews.reviewText: I was lucky and actually only paid $70 for this after taxes which it is worth maybe $120 not the $399 price it’s listed at. I have a house cleaning business and only use shark but the $70 price was too good to pass up. The wall mount doesn’t charge it so you have to plug in the battery. (A wall charging is standard in most name brand stick vacs) I will say I do like the soft roller bristles and the color is very pretty, I bought it for personal use and I do think that it will work fine for around the house, easy to put together. Although I would not pay $400 for this vacuum.
